name: Field of Glory II
description: Field of Glory II is a turn-based tactical game set during the Rise of Rome from 280 BC to 25 BC.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1541 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
